content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->2->6

The shortest path from node 5 to node 6 is 1->2->6. Please note that the answer provided above assumes that the graph is undirected and represents the shortest path between any pair of nodes. If the graph is directed, the path may differ.

1->5->2

The shortest path from node 5 to node 2 is 1->5->2. Please note that the answer provided above assumes that the graph is undirected and represents the shortest path between any pair of nodes. If the graph is directed, the path may differ.
